Primary Contact: Laura Elliott, Artistic Director, Creator's Arts Centre; Phone: 250.860.6616; Email: laura@creatorsarts.com
Alternate Contact: Kim Denis, Studio Director, Creator's Arts Centre; Phone: 250.860.6616
Service Details: Dance studio. Jazz, Tap, Contemporary, Lyrical, Hip Hop, Acrobatics, and Royal Academy of Dance Ballet. Recreational and competitive classes. Ages 18 months -18yrs. All boy's classes and classes for children with special needs. Creator’s Arts Centre is a registered charity with a full Tuition Assistance Program and received the Central Okanagan Foundation Arts Association Award at the Okanagan Arts Awards and was nominated in the Dance category in 2017.
How to Apply: Registration done through the website: www.creatorsarts.com
